Package camzup.pfriendly

Class Zup3

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PImage
processing.core.PGraphics
processing.opengl.PGraphicsOpenGL
camzup.pfriendly.UpOgl
camzup.pfriendly.Up3
camzup.pfriendly.Zup3
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUp, IUp3, IUpOgl, java.lang.Cloneable, processing.core.PConstants
public class Zup3
extends Up3
A 3D renderer where (0.0, 0.0, 1.0) is the default world up axis.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface camzup.pfriendly.IUpOgl

      public void camera​(float eyeX, float eyeY, float eyeZ, float centerX, float centerY, float centerZ)
      Looks at the center point from the eye point, using the default reference up axis.
      Parameters:
      eyeX - camera location x
      eyeY - camera location y
      eyeZ - camera location z
      centerX - target location x
      centerY - target location y
      centerZ - target location z

    • setSize

      public void setSize​(int iwidth, int iheight)
      Set size is the last function called by size, createGraphics, makeGraphics, etc. when initializing the graphics renderer. Therefore, any additional values that need initialization can be attempted here.
      Overrides:
      setSize in class UpOgl
      Parameters:
      iwidth - the width in pixels
      iheight - the height in pixels
